builtin_variables.name: WixBundleAction
builtin_variables.description: Numeric value of BOOTSTRAPPER_ACTION from command-line. Updated during Plan().

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleActiveParent
builtin_variables.description: Registration ID of parent bundle if being run as embedded.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleCommandLineAction
builtin_variables.description: Action passed on command line before parsing.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleDirectoryLayout
builtin_variables.description: Folder for -layout switch. Defaults to bundle executable directory.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleElevated
builtin_variables.description: Set to 1 once bundle is elevated. Use to show/hide elevation shield.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleExecutePackageAction
builtin_variables.description: Action being executed on current package.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleExecutePackageCacheFolder
builtin_variables.description: Absolute path to currently executing package's cache folder. Only available during package execution.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleForcedRestartPackage
builtin_variables.description: ID of package that forced a restart (required restart during apply).

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleInstalled
builtin_variables.description: Set to 1 if bundle was already installed. Set during engine initialization.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleLastUsedSource
builtin_variables.description: Path used to acquire container or standalone payload.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleLog
builtin_variables.description: Path to bundle's log file. Can be overwritten before Apply to redirect.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleLog_<PackageId>
builtin_variables.description: Path to package-specific log file. Replace <PackageId> with actual ID.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleManufacturer
builtin_variables.description: Manufacturer name from Bundle/@Manufacturer attribute.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleName
builtin_variables.description: Bundle name from Bundle/@Name attribute.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleOriginalSource
builtin_variables.description: Original source path of bundle.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleOriginalSourceFolder
builtin_variables.description: Folder containing original bundle source.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleProviderKey
builtin_variables.description: Dependency provider key for bundle.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleSourceProcessFolder
builtin_variables.description: Folder of currently executing process.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleSourceProcessPath
builtin_variables.description: Full path of currently executing process.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleTag
builtin_variables.description: Tag value from Bundle/@Tag attribute. Used for organizing updates.

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleUILevel
builtin_variables.description: UI level (BOOTSTRAPPER_DISPLAY enum).

builtin_variables.name: WixBundleVersion
builtin_variables.description: Version from Bundle/@Version attribute.

system_variables.name: CommonFiles6432Folder
system_variables.description: Common Files folder appropriate for package bitness.

system_variables.name: Privileged
system_variables.description: Set to 1 if running with admin privileges.

system_variables.name: ProgramFiles6432Folder
system_variables.description: Program Files folder appropriate for package bitness.

system_variables.name: ProgramMenuFolder
system_variables.description: Path to Start Menu Programs folder.

system_variables.name: RebootPending
system_variables.description: Set to 1 if system has pending reboot.

variable_attributes.description: Variable type: string, numeric, version, formatted.
If yes, can be set from command line.
If yes, value hidden in logs.
If yes, value persisted across runs.
